sig_info: Combat tests Blackagar Boltagon's restraint. Each time he is struck by a Critical Hit, he has a chance to gain a permanent Cruelty or Fury Buff. Each time he strikes with his own Critical Hit, he has a chance to gain a Fury or Cruelty Buff for 6.50 seconds.
Fury Buffs increase Attack by 4.98 to 17.57.
Cruelty Buffs increase Critical Damage Rating by 19.43 to 70.72

Combat tests Blackagar Boltagon's restraint. Each time he is struck by a Critical Hit, he has a chance to gain a permanent Cruelty or Fury Buff. Each time he strikes with his own Critical Hit, he has a chance to gain a Fury or Cruelty Buff for 6.50 seconds.
Fury Buffs increase Attack by 6.54 to 23.07.
Cruelty Buffs increase Critical Damage Rating by 20.04 to 72.93
